nodes.text: Mayvitch 7 was a moon of Amador in the Chalenor system of the Expansion Region. It was colonized by Human colonists from Immalia who established a small outpost on it to protect their mining operations from pirate attacks. In 33 BBY, during the Yinchorri Uprising, the Yinchorri conquered the moon during the Battle of Mayvitch 7.
